info.name: imo.im dark theme for new look
info.description: Since the imo.im interface has been updated and I don't want to ruin my other style (just in case), here a version for their new look.
info.additionalInfo: Currently this is a first version. Right now I don't have enough time to change the less frequently used parts of the style. I will work on it as soon as i can find some more spare time.
